Load scorekeeper, sjmisc, haven, readxl
```{r, setup, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(scorekeeper)
library(sjmisc)
library(haven)
library(readxl)
library(cgwtools)
library(dplyr)
```

Load Raw Data file
```{r, results='hide'}
ALSPAC_Raw <- read_spss('data/Schaumberg_22June22.sav') %>% 
  filter(qlet == "A")
```


```{r}
demo_score <- read_excel("scoresheets/clean/Demographics.xlsx")
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
demographics_scored <- scorekeep(ALSPAC_Raw, demo_score)
```

```{r}
demographics <- demographics_scored [[7]]
resave(demographics, file = 'ALSPAC_Cleaned.RData')
```
